author: timbeiko
content: Also, I'd recommend r/ethereum as a place where you can get somewhat technical answers to some of your questions. There is also an ethereum-focused stack exchange for very in the weeds stuff: https://ethereum.stackexchange.com/

author: timbeiko
content: One more thing, to echo Trent: most folks here have been working on Ethereum for _years_, so no matter how smart you are, it's normal you will feel like you don't know as much given they've got such a big head start.
